query:
SELECT 
  'Clientes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN qualidadeScore >= 90 THEN 1 END) as excelentes,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN qualidadeScore >= 70 THEN 1 END) as bons,
  ROUND(AVG(qualidadeScore), 2) as avg_quality
FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Mercados',
  COUNT(*),
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL
FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Produtos',
  COUNT(*),
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL
FROM produtos WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Concorrentes',
  COUNT(DISTINCT concorrenteHash),
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL
FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Leads',
  COUNT(DISTINCT leadHash),
  NULL,
  NULL,
  NULL
FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1;
